150.textMFS: <VL<T'To show, hide, or toggle the perpendicular'><T'bisector, create an instant movement button'><T'to move point mirror-show to point'><T'mirror-on, point mirror-off, or point'><T'mirror-toggle respectively.'><F110xxFFFFFFFFx20xF0x>>
